alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 12:41PM AKST until November 21 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will be patchy and light. Some areas will see a light glaze of ice while others will remain dry. Temperatures will slowly warm through the day, gradually rising above freezing this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
